p: Treatment of rats with bromocriptine and/or BHE caused reduction in the plasma prolactin level but no significant change in the plasma GnRH, FSH, LH and estradiol (except for the significant increase in FSH of rats that were co-administered with bromocriptine and 10 mg/kg BHE) when compared to control. Neither bromocriptine nor any of the doses of BHE affected the plasma testosterone, but their co-administration significantly increased the plasma testosterone level (Table 2).
